name: No Bake Cookies
instructions: Put sugar and cocoa into a sauce pan and stir together.
Add butter and milk, and heat mixture on stovetop over medium heat.
Bring to a rolling boil and boil for 1 minute.
Stir in vanilla and peanut butter and remove from heat.
Stir in oatmeal and butterscotch chips.
Scoop tablespoon size balls and place on wax paper to cool.
